General.Name: Hopscotch Groupe S.A.
General.Description: Hopscotch Global PR Group operates in public relations (PR) business in France and internationally. The company operates in specialized agencies, include Le Public Système PR, an agency for the reputation of companies and opinion formers; Sagarmatha that carries out internal and event communication campaigns; Le Public Système Cinema, a structure for cinema expertise; Heaven, an advertising agency; and Human to Human to preserve build, and restore the reputation of brands, companies, and managers on the Internet. It provides Beeshake, a collective intelligence platform in SaaS mode; Capdel, an agile solution for small and medium business events; and Sopexa that supports companies, brands, collectivities, and institutions in the food, drink, and lifestyle sectors. It serves luxe, sports, bank, insurance, real estate, entertainment, health, tourism, automotive, food and drinks, technology, aeronautics, transport, and energy industries. The company was formerly known as Public Système Hopscotch and changed its name to Hopscotch Global PR Group in February 2015. Hopscotch Global PR Group was founded in 1968 and is based in Paris, France.
General.Address: 23-25, rue Notre Dame des Victoires, Paris, France, 75002

4.Name: Mr. Bruno  Barde
4.Title: Chairman of Le Public Système Cinéma
